channel.title: 杂记 on Rainy · Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 杂记 on Rainy · Blog

item.title: 卧槽
item.description: 1<div class="search"> 2 <i class="material-icons search-icon search-start">search</i> 3 <input type="text" class="search-input" placeholder="Searching..." /> 4 <i class="material-icons search-icon search-clear">clear</i> 5 <div class="search-results"></div> 6</div> 1// 获取搜索框、搜索按钮、清空搜索、结果输出对应的元素 2var searchBtn = document.querySelector('.search-start'); 3var searchClear = document.querySelector('.search-clear'); 4var searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input'); 5var searchResults = document.querySelector('.search-results'); 6 7// 申明保存文章的标题、链接、内容的数组变量 8var searchValue = '', 9 arrItems = [], 10 arrContents = [], 11 arrLinks = [], 12 arrTitles = [], 13 arrResults = [], 14 indexItem = [], 15 itemLength = 0; 16var tmpDiv = document.
